data.eml:eml: Review of the West Indian genus Monotalla Bechyne (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae, Alticini) with description of five new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Konstantinov, Alexander S., Linzmeier, Adelita M., Clark, Shawn M., Ivie, Michael A. (2015): Review of the West Indian genus Monotalla Bechyne (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Galerucinae, Alticini) with description of five new species. ZooKeys 505: 117-136, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.505.9434, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.505.9434
